verbose_text: To determine whether the increase in PI3K / Akt phosphorylation by Ang-(1-7) contributes to the cardioprotective effect of Ang-(1-7) against HG induced cytotoxicity, H9c2 cardiomyoblasts were co-conditioned with 1 muM Ang-(1-7) and 35 mM glucose in the presence of 10 muM LY294002 (a selective inhibitor of PI3K / Akt).
